channel.title: M1a2 Abrams VS Challenger 2
channel.description:
Ive been wondering quite alot lately which is the best tank out of these two... at first i was slightly leaning towards the M1a2 but after research i have changed my mind..
Challenger 2 Pros:
Rifled barrel Is more accurate then the m1 is the most reliable tank in the world (sorry spelling) is more manuverable then the m1 (again spelling sorry) And has the best type of armor in the world.
M1a1 Pros:
Smoothbore barrel 1500bhp engine Depleted uranium armor
So whats your guys views?
From what i can see the only thing the m1 has better then the challenger is its technology inside the tank or what ever the program said
